name: RPG Battle
description:
Survive the stand-off by making wise decisions. The more shots you take at once, the less accurate they get! Watch out for glowing guns when your enemies take aim; they won't miss! Don't forget to duck and reload your gun when you're out of ammo.

Controls:

  • Left click to select menu options
  • Esc to go back a menu
  • F5 to restart

Created in 2 hours for Game-U LIVE. Watch the recording here!
